topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e55bc863687206df5a1300#post_54e55bc863687206df5a1300
ALL OF THEM!


No offense to anyone, but sometimes I hate drag queens not because of what they wear or such but because thanks to them constantly hogging the spotlight in the glbt community and giving no time to trans people thanks to that the initial reaction by people to trans/crossdressers is imagining people lumberjacks in dresses.  If a guy wants to wear a dress or such that's fine but don't go metaphorically go "Hi I'm Ms. Beauty I'd like to talk to the audience about my coming out stor-" "*interrupts* HI! I'M MR. LUMBERJACK!  DRAG PRIDE!"  Trans people/crossdressers get fuck all mass media cause it's constantly hogged so of course there will be a negative stigma.

If I had to summarize why I don't like draq queens it's cause the majority of them are the Kayne West of the glbt community.
